descript.abstract: The geographic extent of a local government (City, Village, Township).

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The user who performed the last update
The date the feature was last updated in the maintenance database
The five digit FIPS code for the municipality as assigned by the Federal Government
The area of the municipality in square miles
